column4: i got a ? when i boot the pc it says it cant start , /bin/sh :cant access tty; job control turned off i was wondering hoew to turn job control back on
i got a ? when i boot the pc it says it cant start , /bin/sh :cant access tty; job control turned off i was wondering hoew to turn job control back on
is job control the at daemon?
is ubuntu the only OS your running on the pc?
well no i have many kernels and an old xp install on there too
does it look like grub is finding the stage2 loader?  or is grub hangning?
takes long time to do nothing
sounds like your grub configuration isn't pointing to the correct OS loader
can i fix that without installind again
yes...when grub starts running there is a command to interupt the loading process...this will allow you to pick your stage2 img loader...can't remember the command though
any fourms or links you know that will help
http://www.linuxmigration.com/quickref/kernel/grub.html this looks like a good start
